    import styled from "styled-components";

const Parent = styled.div`
  display: flex;
`;

const Button = styled.button`
  background-color: black;
  color: white;
  border: 0;
  border-radius: 5px;
`;

function App() {
  return (
    <Parent>
      <Button>ë¡œê·¸ì¸</Button>
    </Parent>
  );
}

export default App;

    <Parent>
      <Button>ë¡œê·¸ì¸</Button>
      <Button as="a">ì „ a íƒœê·¸ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤.</Button>

    import styled from "styled-components";

const Parent = styled.div`
  display: flex;
`;

const Input = styled.input`
  background-color: black;
`;

function App() {
  return (
    <Parent>
      <Input placeholder="hello" />
      <Input placeholder="hello" />
      <Input placeholder="hello" />
      <Input placeholder="hello" />
      <Input placeholder="hello" />
    </Parent>
  );
}

export default App;

    import styled from "styled-components";

const Parent = styled.div`
  display: flex;
`;

const Input = styled.input.attrs()`
  background-color: black;
`;

function App() {
  return (
    <Parent>
      <Input />
      <Input />
      <Input />
      <Input />
      <Input />
    </Parent>
  );
}

export default App;
